data.title: Imouto Paradise!
data.meta_description: Play all your games on Linux. Lutris is an Open Source gaming platform for Linux. It installs and launches games so you can start playing without the hassle of setting up your game. Get your games from GOG, Steam, Battle.net, Origin, Uplay and many other sources running on any Linux powered gaming machine.
data.text:
Wine MangaGamer version last published 2 years, 6 months ago

If you want to run the game fullscreen, when asked select:

"Allow resizing of the game window" and "Software Rendering (Best Quality)", save the changes, and when the game starts, press Alt+Enter to switch to fullscreen.
